post.title: breaking in my new plasma
post.content: i just got a panasonic tcp42s30. how do i calibrate this? right now i have it set to: picture mode: cinema contrast: +50 brightness: +50 color: +50 tint: 0 sharpness: +50 should i have things set lower/higher? i'm trying to ease into this plasma... would hate to get some image retention/burn in after i just got it.
